column3: International Business School Suzhou at XJTLU
column5: This dynamic and innovative programme prepares you for management positions across a wide range of industries and assists you in preparation for more senior roles.Open to those with an undergraduate degree in any discipline, the MSc Management programme offers you broad theoretical and practical knowledge of management. The modules cover a range of topics of relevance in China and around the globe, including international business, strategy, finance, leadership, marketing and entrepreneurship. You will also complete a research project based on a critical problem related to your current work or future role.
